insertShortcutTable.caption: General
insertShortcutTable.description: Report shortcuts perform commands on an active report view such as selecting and formatting elements, inserting new elements, and sharing the report.

insertShortcutTable.caption: General
insertShortcutTable.description: Layout shortcuts perform actions on an active layout view, such as inserting, selecting, and formatting elements.

insertShortcutTable.caption: Activated Map
insertShortcutTable.description: Shortcuts specific to an activated map frame.

content.buttonTooltip: Elements are listed by drawing order. Drag and drop to change drawing order.
Map surrounds are listed with their associated map frame.
Map series pages are listed by output order.
Elements are listed by drawing order. Drag and drop to change drawing order.

content.L_tooltip: Turn snapping on or off for interactive tools.
Turn snapping on or off for interactive tools.

dockPane.caption: Page Properties
dockPane.delayLoadMessage: Create a new presentation view and add a new page

toolPalette.extendedCaption: Create a graphic element in a layout
Create a line element in a layout
Create a text element in a layout
Create a map frame in a layout

toolPalette.caption: Reshape
toolPalette.extendedCaption: Reshape an element in a layout

splitButton.extendedCaption: Add a north arrow to a layout.
Add a scale bar to a layout.
Add a legend to a layout.
Add a table frame to a layout.
Add a chart frame to a layout.
Add an additional map surround to a layout.
Define a map series on the layout

gallery.caption: New Layout
gallery.tooltip: Create a new layout and add it to the project. The new layout is saved within the project.

gallery.caption: Import Layout
gallery.tooltip: A layout is added to the project and opened. A copy of the layout and any maps included in the file are added to the project. Future changes to the file are not reflected in the project.
Insert a new graphic element.
Insert a new graphic element.

gallery.caption: Orientation
gallery.tooltip: Choose the orientation of the layout.

gallery.caption: Size
gallery.tooltip: Choose the size of the layout.

gallery.caption: Duplicate Layout
gallery.tooltip: Create a new version of the current layout. Set the size and name of the duplicated layout.

gallery.caption: Polgon Symbol
gallery.tooltip: Choose the default symbol of new polygons.

gallery.caption: Polygon Symbol
gallery.tooltip: Change the symbol for the selected elements.

gallery.caption: Line Symbol
gallery.tooltip: Choose the default symbol of new lines.

gallery.caption: Line
gallery.tooltip: Change the symbol for the selected elements.

gallery.caption: Point Symbol
gallery.tooltip: Choose the default symbol of new points.

gallery.caption: Point
gallery.tooltip: Change the symbol for the selected elements.

gallery.caption: Arrowhead
gallery.tooltip: Change the arrowhead for the selected elements.

gallery.caption: Text Symbol
gallery.tooltip: Choose the default text symbol for new text elements.

gallery.caption: Text
gallery.tooltip: Change the symbol for the selected elements.

gallery.caption: Dynamic Text
gallery.tooltip: Create a new dynamic text graphic on the layout.

gallery.caption: Background
gallery.tooltip: Change the background for the selected elements.

gallery.caption: Border
gallery.tooltip: Change the border for the selected elements.

gallery.caption: Drop Shadow
gallery.tooltip: Change the drop shadow for the selected elements.

gallery.caption: North Arrow
gallery.tooltip: Create a new north arrow by choosing a style.

gallery.caption: North Arrow Gallery
gallery.extendedCaption: Change the style for the north arrow in the layout.
gallery.tooltip: Change the style for the selected north arrows.

gallery.caption: Scale Bar
gallery.tooltip: Create a new scale bar by choosing a style.

gallery.caption: Scale Bar Gallery
gallery.tooltip: Change the style for the selected scale bars.

gallery.caption: Legend
gallery.tooltip: Create a new legend by choosing a style.

gallery.caption: Legend Gallery
gallery.tooltip: Change the style for the selected legends.

galleries.gallery:
>
Change the style for the selected legend items.

gallery.caption: Table Frame
gallery.tooltip: Create a new table frame by choosing a style.

gallery.caption: Table Frame Gallery
gallery.tooltip: Change the style for the selected table frames.

gallery.caption: Table Frame Field Gallery
gallery.tooltip: Change the style for the selected table frame fields.

gallery.caption: North Arrow Gallery
gallery.tooltip: Change the style for the selected north arrows.

gallery.caption: North Arrow Gallery
gallery.tooltip: Change the style for the selected north arrows.

gallery.caption: North Arrow Gallery
gallery.tooltip: Change the style for the selected north arrows.

gallery.caption: Meter Reference Guide
gallery.tooltip: Create a new meter reference guide by choosing a style.

gallery.caption: Meter Reference Guide Gallery
gallery.tooltip: Change the style for the selected meter reference guides.

gallery.caption: Slope Guide
gallery.tooltip: Change the style for the selected slope guides.

gallery.caption: Index To Streets
gallery.tooltip: Change the style for the selected index streets.

gallery.caption: Glossary Table
gallery.tooltip: Change the style for the selected glossary tables.

gallery.caption: Map Product Feature Guide
gallery.tooltip: Change the style for the selected map product feature guides.

gallery.caption: Elevation Guide Bar
gallery.tooltip: Create a new elevation guide bar by choosing a style.

gallery.caption: Elevation Guide Bar
gallery.extendedCaption: Change the style of the elevation guide bar in the layout.
gallery.tooltip: Change the style for the selected elevation guide bars.

gallery.caption: Picture
gallery.tooltip: Create a new picture by choosing a source.

gallery.caption: Map Frame
gallery.tooltip: Create a new map frame by choosing a map.

gallery.caption: Zoom To Map View
gallery.tooltip: Zoom to the extent of a map view.

gallery.caption: Map Frame Source
gallery.tooltip: Choose the map associated with the map frame.

gallery.caption: Map Surround Map Frame
gallery.tooltip: Choose the map frame associated with the map surround.

gallery.caption: Extent Indicator
gallery.tooltip: Create a new extent indicator by choosing a map frameExtent Indicators require two 2D map frames.

gallery.caption: Map Grid Style
gallery.extendedCaption: Change the style of the selected map grid.
gallery.tooltip: Change the style for the selected map grid.

gallery.caption: Grid
gallery.tooltip: Create a new grid on the map frameGrids can only be added to 2D map frames.

gallery.caption: Chart Frame
gallery.tooltip: Create a new chart frame on the layout.

gallery.caption: Additional Surrounds
gallery.tooltip: Create a new map surround on the layout. Enable extensions in the licensing options to display additional map surrounds.

gallery.caption: Layout
gallery.tooltip: Choose an existing export preset.

button.caption: Edit Text
button.extendedCaption: Edit the text of the selected element.
button.tooltip: Edit the text of the selected element.

tool.caption: Navigate
tool.tooltip:
1. Pan 2. Zoom 3. Continuous zoom
Quick shortcuts: Shift = zoom rectangle Insert = zoom to full page C = explore when using another tool < = previous extent > = next extent

button.caption: Fixed Zoom Out
button.tooltip: Zoom out a fixed distance.

button.caption: Fixed Zoom In
button.tooltip: Zoom in a fixed distance.

tool.caption: Pan
tool.tooltip: Pan the layout.

button.caption: Zoom to Page
button.tooltip: Zoom to the full extent of the layout.

button.caption: Previous Extent
button.tooltip: Go to the previous extent.

button.caption: Next Extent
button.tooltip: Go to the next extent.

button.caption: Page Width
button.tooltip: Zoom to the width of the page.

button.caption: Zoom 100%
button.tooltip: Zoom to display the layout at 100%. At this zoom level the size on the screen matches the size of the page if it were printed.

button.caption: Zoom To Selected
button.tooltip: Zoom to the extent of the selected elements.

button.caption: Zoom To Last Active Map
button.tooltip: Zoom to the extent of last active map pane.

button.caption: Navigate to page
button.tooltip: Navigate to the selected map series page.

button.caption: Navigate
button.tooltip: Pan and zoom to navigate.

button.caption: Export to File...
button.tooltip: Export the selected Map Series.

button.caption: Print...
button.tooltip: Print the selected Map Series.

button.caption: Map Series
button.tooltip: Define a map series on the layout.

button.caption: Refresh Map Series
button.tooltip: Refresh the map series when the related map data changes.

button.caption: Import web map or print web map...
button.tooltip: Imports a new layout or map from a .WebMap file. For internal testing only.

button.caption: Custom page size...
button.tooltip: Create a new layout using a custom page size.

button.caption: Select page from printer...
button.tooltip: Copy page size from a printer.

button.caption: Custom page size...
button.tooltip: Set a custom page size.

button.caption: Page from Printer
button.tooltip: Copy page size from a printer.

button.caption: Properties
button.tooltip: Show the properties for the layout.

button.caption: Properties
button.tooltip: Show the properties for text and graphics.

button.caption: Create Thumbnail
button.tooltip: Generate thumbnail in the metadata for the layout.

button.caption: Import Thumbnail
button.tooltip: Import thumbnail to the metadata for the layout.

button.caption: Simulate Overprint
button.tooltip: Simulate the appearance of overprinting on the layouy when symbol layers have this option enabled.Simulate Overprint is enabled for layout with a CMYK color model when color management is enabled in the application settings.

button.caption: Properties
button.tooltip: Show the properties for the map series.

button.caption: Ruler Properties
button.tooltip: Change the ruler settings.

button.caption: Rulers
button.tooltip: Show or hide the rulers.

button.caption: Guides
button.tooltip: Show or hide the guides.

button.caption: Margins
button.tooltip: Show or hide the printer margins.You must have selected a layout page size from a printer and opted to include printer margins for margins to draw on the layout.

checkBox.caption: Margins
checkBox.tooltip: Show or hide the printer margins.You must have selected a layout page size from a printer and opted to include printer margins for margins to draw on the layout.

button.caption: Add Guide
button.tooltip: Add a snapping guide to your layout at the location you clicked.

button.caption: Add Multiple Guides
button.tooltip: Add multiple snapping guides to your layout.

button.caption: Remove Guide
button.tooltip: Remove the snapping guide under the mouse.

button.caption: Remove All Guides
button.tooltip: Remove all the snapping guides from your layout.

button.caption: Keep the last tool active
button.tooltip: Keep the last insert tool active after adding a new element. Otherwise, the select tool is reactivated after the element is added.

tool.caption: Rectangle
tool.tooltip: Select elements by clicking them or dragging a box around them.

tool.caption: Polygon
tool.tooltip: Select elements by drawing a polygon around them.

tool.caption: Lasso
tool.tooltip: Select elements by drawing a freehand shape around them.

tool.caption: Circle
tool.tooltip: Select elements by dragging a circle around them.

tool.caption: Line
tool.tooltip: Select elements by drawing a line that intersects them.

button.caption: Select All
button.tooltip: Select all elements.

button.caption: Clear Selection
button.tooltip: Deselect all currently selected elements.

button.caption: Delete
button.tooltip: Delete all currently selected elements.

tool.caption: Inline Edit
tool.tooltip: Edit elements by double-clicking them.

tool.caption: Edit Vertices
tool.tooltip: Add, move, or delete vertices or segments on the selected element.

button.caption: Edit Vertices
button.tooltip: Add, move, or delete vertices or segments on the selected element.

button.caption: Normal
button.tooltip: Select vertices by clicking them or drawing a freehand sketch around them. To exit this mode, click Finish or another command.

button.caption: Add
button.tooltip: Click a segment to add a vertex. To exit this mode, click Finish or another command.

button.caption: Delete
button.tooltip: Click a vertex to delete it. To exit this mode, click Finish or another command.

button.caption: Continue
button.tooltip: Continue sketching vertices.

button.caption: Continue Feature
button.tooltip: Continue sketching vertices.

button.caption: Add Vertex
button.tooltip: Add a vertex at the right-clicked location.

button.caption: Reverse Direction
button.tooltip: Change the direction of the sketch. The first point added to the sketch becomes the last point.

button.caption: To Line
button.tooltip: Change this segment to a straight line.Disabled if the segment is already a line.

button.caption: To Circular Arc
button.tooltip: Change this segment to a circular arc.Disabled if the segment is already an arc.

button.caption: To Bezier Curve
button.tooltip: Change this segment to a bezier curve.Disabled if the segment is already a curve.

button.caption: Delete Vertex
button.tooltip: Delete the right-clicked vertex.

button.caption: Move...
button.tooltip: Move vertex or vertices to the x,y distance specified.

button.caption: Move To...
button.tooltip: Move vertex to the x,y,z location specified.

button.caption: Finish
button.tooltip: Apply the changes and complete the current operation.

button.caption: Cancel
button.tooltip: Discard the changes and exit the current operation.

button.caption: Set as Default
button.tooltip: Set as the default symbol.

button.caption: Group
button.tooltip: Group the selected elements.

button.caption: Ungroup
button.tooltip: Ungroup the selected elements.

button.caption: Convert to Graphics
button.tooltip: Convert the selected elements to simple graphics.

button.caption: Convert to Features
button.tooltip: Convert the grid to features in a feature dataset.

button.caption: Selection
button.extendedCaption: Options for selecting elements in the layout.
button.tooltip: Set options for selecting elements.

button.caption: Create New Selection
button.tooltip: Create a new selection when interactively selecting elements.

button.caption: Add to Current Selection
button.extendedCaption: Add to current selection in the layout.
button.tooltip: Add to the current selection when interactively selecting elements.

button.caption: Remove From Current Selection
button.extendedCaption: Remove from current selection in the layout.
button.tooltip: Remove from the current selection when interactively selecting elements.

button.caption: Select From Current Selection
button.extendedCaption: Select from current selection in the layout.
button.tooltip: Select from the current selection when interactively selectingc elements.

button.caption: Select
button.tooltip: Select elements by clicking them or dragging a box around them.

button.caption: Check Spelling
button.tooltip: Spell check all the text elements on the layout.To enable Check Spelling click the Project tab and select Options. Select Proofing and check Enable spell checking.

button.caption: Open
button.tooltip: Open the chart pane.

button.caption: Remove
button.tooltip: Remove the legend item from the legend.

button.caption: Remove
button.tooltip: Remove the field from the table frame.

dynamicMenu.caption: Add Field
dynamicMenu.tooltip: Add a new field to the table frame.

button.caption: Open
button.tooltip: Open the attribute table.

button.caption: Activate
button.tooltip: Activate the map frame to navigate and interact with the map.

button.caption: Close Activation
button.tooltip: Deactivate the map frame and restore the layout tools.

button.caption: Delete
button.tooltip: Delete the extent indicator from the map frame.

button.caption: Show/Hide Leader
button.tooltip: Show text leader. Use the symbol callout to change appearance.

button.caption: Delete
button.tooltip: Delete the grid from the map frame.

button.caption: New Custom Grid
button.tooltip: Add a new custom map grid to the map frame.

button.caption: Open
button.tooltip: Open the map pane.

button.caption: Show/Hide Leader
button.tooltip: Show text leader. Use the Text Symbol callout to change appearance.

button.caption: Save to Style
button.tooltip: Save the element or the symbol of this graphic as a style item in a style.

button.caption: Save Shape as Legend Patch
button.tooltip: Save the shape of this graphic as a line or area legend patch in a style.

button.caption: Save As Default
button.tooltip: Save selected legend item as the default. This style will be used when new layers are added to the legend.

checkBox.caption: New Column
checkBox.extendedCaption: Start a new legend column with the selected item.
checkBox.tooltip: Start a new legend column with the selected item.

checkBox.caption: Keep In Single Column
checkBox.tooltip: Avoid splitting the selected item across multiple legend columns.

button.caption: Save As Default
button.tooltip: Save selected field as the default. This style will be used when new fields are added to the Table Frame.

button.caption: Align Left
button.tooltip: Align the selected elements to the left.

button.caption: Align Center
button.tooltip: Align the selected elements to the horizontal center.

button.caption: Align Right
button.tooltip: Align the selected elements to the right.

button.caption: Align Top
button.tooltip: Align the selected elements to the top.

button.caption: Align Middle
button.tooltip: Align the selected elements to the vertical center.

button.caption: Align Bottom
button.tooltip: Align the selected elements to the bottom.

button.caption: Align to Page
button.tooltip: Align selected elements relative to the page. (Uncheck to align elements relative to each other).

button.caption: Distribute Horizontal Centers
button.tooltip: Space the center points of the selected elements equally in the horizontal direction. The two outside elements remain stationary.

button.caption: Distribute Vertical Centers
button.tooltip: Space the center points of the selected elements equally in the vertical direction. The two outside elements remain stationary.

button.caption: Distribute Horizontally
button.tooltip: Distribute the selected elements so that there is an equal amount of space between their edges.

button.caption: Distribute Vertically
button.tooltip: Distribute the selected elements so that there is an equal amount of space between their edges.

button.caption: Make Same Size
button.tooltip: Make all of the selected elements the same size.

button.caption: Make Same Width
button.tooltip: Make all of the selected elements the same width.

button.caption: Make Same Height
button.tooltip: Make all of the selected elements the same height.

button.caption: Fit To Margins
button.tooltip: Make the selected elements the same size as the printer margin, or the same size as the full page if no printer margin is displayed.

button.caption: Fit To Margin Width
button.tooltip: Make the selected elements the same width as the printer margin, or the same width as the full page if no printer margin is displayed.

button.caption: Fit To Margin Height
button.tooltip: Make the selected elements the same height as the printer margin, or the same height as the full page if no printer margin is displayed.

button.caption: Rotate Left 90°
button.tooltip: Rotate selected elements 90 degrees to the left.

button.caption: Rotate Right 90°
button.tooltip: Rotate selected elements 90 degrees to the right.

button.caption: Flip Vertical
button.tooltip: Flip selected elements upside down.

button.caption: Flip Horizontal
button.tooltip: Flip selected elements to create a mirror image.

button.caption: Convert to Rectangle Text
button.tooltip: Convert this straight text element to a rectangle text element that supports automatic word wrapping.

button.caption: Convert to Straight Text
button.tooltip: Convert this rectangle text element to a straight text element that automatically resizes the text along with the element. This option is not available if the text has multiple columns.

button.caption: Bring To Front
button.tooltip: Bring elements to the front of the drawing order.

button.caption: Bring Forward
button.tooltip: Bring elements forward in the drawing order.

button.caption: Send Backward
button.tooltip: Send elements backward in the drawing order.

button.caption: Send To Back
button.tooltip: Send elements to the back of the drawing order.

button.caption: Nudge Left
button.tooltip: Move element to the left by ½ point.

button.caption: Nudge Right
button.tooltip: Move element to the right by ½ point.

button.caption: Nudge Up
button.tooltip: Move element to the up by ½ point.

button.caption: Nudge Down
button.tooltip: Move element to the down by ½ point.

button.caption: Union
button.tooltip: Create a single element by unioning the shapes of all of the selected elements.

button.caption: Intersect
button.tooltip: Create a single element by intersecting the shapes of all of the selected elements.

button.caption: Remove Overlap
button.tooltip: Create a single element by combining the shapes of all of the selected elements and removing overlap.

button.caption: Subtract
button.tooltip: Create a single element by subtracting the shapes of all of the selected elements.

customControl.caption: Transparency
customControl.tooltip: Set the transparency of the picture.

tool.caption: Crop Picture
tool.tooltip: Interactively crop a picture.

tool.caption: North Arrow
tool.tooltip: Create a new north arrow on the layout. Single click to use the default size. Drag a rectangle to specify height.

tool.caption: Scale Bar
tool.tooltip: Create a new scale bar on the layout.

tool.caption: Legend
tool.tooltip: Create a new legend on the layout. If layers are selected in the map frame, only those layers will be added to the legend. If no layers are selected, all items will be added.

tool.caption: Chart Frame
tool.tooltip: Create a new chart frame on the layout.

tool.caption: Table Frame
tool.tooltip: Create a new table frame on the layout. Specify the associated layer or standalone table by selecting it in the Contents pane. Select a layer or standalone table in the Contents pane.

tool.caption: Rectangle
tool.tooltip: Create a new map frame by dragging a rectangle.

tool.caption: Polygon
tool.tooltip: Create a new map frame by dragging a polygon.

tool.caption: Lasso

tool.tooltip: Create a new map frame by by dragging an ellipse.

tool.caption: Circle

tool.tooltip: Replace the existing element extent with a new one by dragging a rectangle.A map frame needs to be selected

tool.caption: Polygon
tool.tooltip: Replace the element extent with a new one by dragging a polygon.A map frame needs to be selected

tool.caption: Lasso
tool.tooltip: Replace the element extent with a new one by dragging a freehand shape.A map frame needs to be selected

tool.caption: Ellipse

tool.caption: Circle

button.caption: More...
button.tooltip: Choose the symbol for the shadows of the selected elements.

comboBox.caption: Size
comboBox.tooltip: Set the symbol size of the selected elements.

comboBox.caption: Width
comboBox.tooltip: Set the line or outline width of the selected elements.

button.caption: More Colors...
button.extendedCaption: Choose fill color of the element in the layout.
button.tooltip: Choose the fill color of the selected elements.

button.caption: More Colors...
button.extendedCaption: Choose outline color of the element in the layout.
button.tooltip: Choose the outline color of the selected elements.

button.caption: More Colors...
button.extendedCaption: Choose the text color of the element in the layout.
button.tooltip: Choose the text color of the selected elements.

customControl.caption: Font
customControl.extendedCaption: Choose font for an element in the layout.
customControl.tooltip: Choose a font for the selected text.

comboBox.caption: Font Size
comboBox.tooltip: Choose a font size for the selected text.

button.caption: Grow Font
button.tooltip: Increase the font size of the selected text.

button.caption: Decrease Font Size
button.tooltip: Decrease the font size of the selected text.

comboBox.caption: Font Style
comboBox.extendedCaption: Choose font style for an element in the layout.
comboBox.tooltip: Choose a font style for the selected text.

customControl.caption: Font Settings
customControl.tooltip: Modify the parameters of the font style.

editBox.caption: Division Value
editBox.tooltip: Set the value represented by one division.

checkBox.caption: Fixed frame
checkBox.tooltip: Fix the scale bar width. Use the Fitting Strategy options to adjust the scale bar divisions and values. If this box is unchecked, the scale bar retains the division value and number of divisions and subdivisions.

comboBox.caption: Fitting Strategy
comboBox.extendedCaption: Choose the fitting strategy of scale bar in the layout.
comboBox.tooltip:
Choose how the scale bar responds to changes in the map scale.
Adjust width preserves the division value and number of divisions. Manual resizing is not allowed.
Adjust division value preserves the number of divisions. Manual resizing is allowed.
Adjust number of divisions preserves the division value. Manual resizing is allowed.
Adjust divisions and division values preserves the number of subdivisions by adjusting the number of divisions first, then the division values. Manual resizing is allowed.
Fixed bar width preserves the total width of the scale bar, not including labels and numbers, in page units. Manual resizing is not allowed.

editBox.caption: Scale Bar Width
editBox.tooltip: The total width of the scale bar, not including labels and numbers, in page units.

checkBox.caption: Show one division before zero
checkBox.tooltip: Show one division to the left of the zero mark.

comboBox.caption: Units
comboBox.tooltip: Choose the units represented in the scale bar.

comboBox.caption: Label Position
comboBox.tooltip: Choose the position of the units label relative to the bar and numbers.

editBox.caption: Label
editBox.tooltip: Set the label for the scale bar units.

comboBox.caption: Frequency
comboBox.extendedCaption: Choose the frequency of marks for the scale bar in the layout.
comboBox.tooltip: Choose the frequency of marks relative to the bar and the divisions and subdivisions.

comboBox.caption: Position
comboBox.extendedCaption: Choose location of the marks for the scale bar in the layout.
comboBox.tooltip: Choose the location of the marks relative to the bar.

comboBox.caption: Frequency
comboBox.extendedCaption: Choose the frequency of numbers for the scale bar in the layout.
comboBox.tooltip: Choose the frequency of numbers relative to the bar and the divisions and subdivisions.

comboBox.caption: Position
comboBox.extendedCaption: Choose the location of the numbers for the scale bar in the layout.
comboBox.tooltip: Choose the location of the numbers relative to the bar.

checkBox.caption: Use fractional characters
checkBox.tooltip: Use standard fraction characters to label divisions or subdivisions. This applies when the values are ¼, ½, or ¾.

comboBox.caption: Type
comboBox.extendedCaption: Choose how north angle is calculated in the layout.
comboBox.tooltip: Choose how the north angle is calculated.

button.caption: Properties
button.tooltip: Open the Element pane to access advanced properties of elements.

button.caption: Properties
button.tooltip: Show the Element pane. Use this pane to access advanced properties and formatting controls for elements on the layout.

button.caption: Format Symbol
button.tooltip: Format the polygon symbol using the advanced formatting controls available on the Element pane.

button.tooltip: Format the line symbol using the advanced formatting controls available on the Element pane.

button.tooltip: Format the table frame field using the advanced formatting controls available on the Element pane.

button.tooltip: Format the map grid using the advanced formatting controls available on the Element pane.

button.tooltip: Format the text symbol using the advanced formatting controls available on the Element pane.

button.tooltip: Format the meter reference guide using the advanced formatting controls available on the Element pane.

button.caption: Format Elevation Guide Bar
button.tooltip: Format the elevation guide bar using the advanced formatting controls available on the Element pane.

button.caption: Format Index To Streets
button.tooltip: Format the index to streets using the advanced formatting controls available on the Element pane.

button.caption: Format Glossary Table
button.tooltip: Format the glossary table using the advanced formatting controls available on the Element pane.

button.tooltip: Format the map product feature guide using the advanced formatting controls available on the Element pane.

button.caption: Proofing Options
button.tooltip: Show the Proofing options dialog to control spell checking.

button.caption: New Layout
button.tooltip: Create a new layout and add it to the project. The new layout is saved within the project.

button.caption: Import
button.tooltip: Import an existing ArcMap, ArcGlobe, or ArcScene document, a map or basemap package, or a map or layout file to the project. The original data frames and layout are converted to the ArcGIS Pro format, if appropriate, and added to the project. Future changes to the original document are not reflected in the project. One of the new maps or layouts is opened in a view.

button.caption: Import Map
button.tooltip: Import an existing ArcMap, ArcGlobe, or ArcScene document, a map or basemap package, or a map or layout file to the project. The original data frames and layout are converted to the ArcGIS Pro format, if appropriate, and added to the project. Future changes to the original document are not reflected in the project. One of the new maps or layouts is opened in a view.

button.caption: Import Layout
button.tooltip: Import an existing layout file or ArcMap document to the project. For ArcMap documents, the original data frames and layout are converted to the ArcGIS Pro format, if appropriate, and added to the project. Future changes to the original document are not reflected in the project. The new layout is opened in a view.

button.caption: Import
button.tooltip: Import an existing layout file or ArcMap document to the project. For ArcMap documents, the original data frames and layout are converted to the ArcGIS Pro format, if appropriate, and added to the project. Future changes to the original document are not reflected in the project. The new layout is opened in a view.

button.caption: Import layout file...
button.tooltip: A layout is added to the project and opened. A copy of the layout and any maps included in the file are added to the project. Future changes to the file are not reflected in the project.

button.caption: Open
button.tooltip: View the layout.

button.caption: Delete
button.tooltip: Remove the layout from the project.

button.caption: Export to File...
button.tooltip: Export the layout to a file on disk.

button.caption: Properties
button.tooltip: View the properties of the layout.

button.caption: Open preset
button.tooltip: Open a preset by browsing to a file location.

button.caption: Guide Snapping
button.tooltip: Snap to guides when using interactive layout tools.

button.caption: Element Snapping
button.tooltip: Snap to other elements when using interactive layout tools.

button.caption: Printer Margin Snapping
button.tooltip: Snap to margins when using interactive layout tools.

button.caption: Page Snapping
button.tooltip: Snap to page boundaries when using interactive layout tools.

button.caption: Hyperlink
button.tooltip: Add a hyperlink to access web pages or files from the layout.

button.caption: Remove Hyperlink
button.tooltip: Use the button to remove the current hyperlink.

menu.caption: New Layout
menu.extendedCaption: Create, paste or import a layout.

menu.caption: Order
menu.tooltip: Change the Z order of the selected elements.

Move the selected element(s) by a small amount.

menu.caption: Merge Shapes
menu.tooltip: Merge the shapes of the selected elements.

gallery.caption: Dynamic Text
gallery.tooltip: Create new dynamic text on the report.Activate a report subsection.

gallery.caption: Orientation
gallery.tooltip: Choose the orientation of the report.

gallery.caption: Size
gallery.tooltip: Choose the size of the report.

gallery.caption: Chart Frame
gallery.tooltip: Create a new chart frame on the report. Activate a Report or Group Header or Footer subsection. The report data source must be a layer in a map or scene and contain a chart.

gallery.caption: Map Frame
gallery.tooltip: Create a new map frame by choosing a map.Activate the Report Header or Footer, Group Header or Footer, or Details subsection. The report data source cannot be a standalone table when used in the Group Header, Group Footer or Details subsection.

gallery.caption: Picture
gallery.tooltip: Create a new picture by choosing a source.Activate a report subsection.

button.caption: Zoom To Selected
button.tooltip: Zoom to the extent of the selected elements.

button.caption: Page Width
button.tooltip: Zoom to the width of the page.

button.caption: Zoom to 100%
button.tooltip: Zoom to display elements at their actual size.

button.caption: Previous Extent
button.tooltip: Go to the previous extent.

button.caption: Next Extent
button.tooltip: Go to the next extent.

button.caption: New Report
button.tooltip: Create a new report and add it to the project. The new report is saved within the project.

button.caption: New Report
button.tooltip: Create a new report and add it to the project. The new report is saved within the project.

button.caption: New Report
button.tooltip: Create a new report for the layer and add it to the project. The new report is saved within the project.Layer does not have an associated table.

button.caption: Import
button.tooltip: A report stored in an ArcGIS Pro report file is added to the project and opened. A copy of the report is added to the project. Future changes to the report file are not reflected in the project.

button.caption: Import Report
button.tooltip: A report stored in an ArcGIS Pro report file is added to the project and opened. A copy of the report is added to the project. Future changes to the report file are not reflected in the project.

button.caption: New
button.extendedCaption: Create a new custom report template
button.tooltip: Create a new custom report template. Cannot create a new template. The default template file is missing.

button.caption: New Custom Template
button.extendedCaption: Create a new custom report template
button.tooltip: Create a new custom report template. Cannot create a new template. The default template file is missing.

button.caption: Open
button.tooltip: Open a custom report template.

button.caption: Open Custom Template
button.tooltip: Open a custom report template.

button.caption: Save
button.tooltip: Save the template edits or save the template as a new template in a new location.Template has not been edited.

button.caption: Save
button.tooltip: Save the template.Template has not been edited.

button.caption: Save As
button.tooltip: Save the template with a new name and new location.Make a template the active view.

button.caption: New Report
button.tooltip: Create a new report using the active template.Make a template the active view.

button.caption: Open
button.tooltip: View the report.

button.caption: Delete
button.tooltip: Remove the report from the project.

button.tooltip: View the properties of the report.

button.caption: Move Group Down
button.tooltip: Move the group subsection down.

button.caption: Select All
button.tooltip: Select all elements.

button.tooltip: Deselect all currently selected elements on the report.

button.tooltip: Zoom to the extent of the selected subsection.

button.caption: Properties
button.tooltip: Show the properties for the report.

button.tooltip: Show the properties for the report section.

button.tooltip: Show the properties for the Related Report.

button.tooltip: Show the properties for the report.

button.tooltip: Zoom to the full extent of the report.

button.caption: Navigate
button.tooltip: Pan and zoom the report to navigate.

button.caption: Properties
button.tooltip: Show the Element pane. Use this pane to access advanced properties and formatting controls for elements on the report.

button.caption: Related Report
button.tooltip: Add a Related Report into the report.Activate a Details or Related Report subsection.

button.caption: New Related Report
button.tooltip: Add a Related Report into the report.Cannot create a new related report template. The default template file is missing.

button.caption: Related Report
button.tooltip: Add a Related Report into the report template.Cannot create a new related report template. Activate a Details or Related Report subsection, or the default template file is missing.

button.tooltip: Remove Related Report section.

button.extendedCaption: Move the related report section up
button.tooltip: Move the related report section up.

button.caption: Move Down

button.tooltip: Move the related report section down.

button.tooltip: Add a subreport into the report.Select a Report section in the Contents pane.

button.tooltip: Add an existing template subreport into the report template.Select a Report section in the Contents pane.

button.tooltip: Add a supplemental page into the report below this section.Select a Report section in the Contents pane.

button.caption: Add Subreport Below
button.tooltip: Add a subreport into the report below this section.Select a Report section in the Contents pane.

button.caption: Add New Template Subreport Below

button.tooltip: Add a new template subreport into the report template below this section.Select a Report section in the Contents pane.

button.caption: Move Section Up
button.tooltip: Move the section up.

button.caption: Move Section Down
button.tooltip: Move the section down.

button.caption: Replace Page
button.tooltip: Replace supplemental page with another layout.Select a layout page section in the Contents pane.

button.caption: Remove Page
button.tooltip: Remove the supplemental page from the report.Select a supplemental page section in the Contents pane.

button.caption: Open and Edit Layout
button.tooltip: Edit the layout of this page.A layout page section must be selected in the Contents pane, or the layout is missing or invalid.

button.caption: Properties
button.tooltip: View the properties of the layout.

button.caption: Include Page Numbers
button.extendedCaption: Add page numbers to supplemental page
button.tooltip: Include page numbers on this page when exporting the report.A layout page section must be selected in the Contents pane, or the layout is missing or invalid.

button.caption: Start on New Page
button.extendedCaption: Start supplemental page on a new page
button.tooltip: Start supplemental page on a new page.A layout page section must be selected in the Contents pane, or the layout is missing or invalid.

button.caption: Remove Section
button.tooltip: Remove the section from the report.Cannot remove last report section.

button.caption: Add New Report Above
button.extendedCaption: Add a new report above current section
button.tooltip: Add a new report into the report above this section.Select a Report section in the Contents pane.

button.caption: Add New Report Below
button.extendedCaption: Add a new report below current section
button.tooltip: Add a new report into the report below this section.Select a Report section in the Contents pane.

button.caption: Close Activation
button.tooltip: Deactivate the map frame and restore the report tools.

button.caption: Align to Subsection
button.tooltip: Align selected elements relative to the subsection. (Uncheck to align elements relative to each other).

button.caption: Sorting
button.tooltip: Open the Sorting options for the report or related report.Select a Report or Related Report section.

button.caption: Delete
button.tooltip: Delete the selected items from the report.

button.caption: Preview
button.tooltip: Open preview window.One or more reports are missing data sources.

button.caption: Expressions
button.tooltip: Open the Expressions options for the report or related report.Select a Report or Related Report section.

checkBox.caption: Use as cover page
checkBox.tooltip: Use the Report Header as a stand alone cover page.

checkBox.caption: Wrap text elements
checkBox.tooltip: Enable automatic text wrapping and height growth for report text elements.

checkBox.caption: Repeat on every page
checkBox.tooltip: Repeat the group header on every page.

checkBox.caption: Keep together
checkBox.tooltip: Prevent a page break for a record.

checkBox.caption: Align to bottom of page
checkBox.tooltip: Force the subsection to export at the bottom of the page.

editBox.caption: Exclude header from page(s)
editBox.tooltip: Do not print header/footer from pages.

comboBox.caption: Sort
comboBox.extendedCaption: Sort option for the group field.

tool.caption: Field
tool.tooltip: Create a new field element on the report by drawing a rectangle.Activate a Group Header, Details or Group Footer subsection.

tool.caption: Autofill Fields
tool.extendedCaption: Auto fill field elements to report template
tool.tooltip: Add multiple field elements to the report template.Activate the Details subsection.

tool.caption: Mean
tool.tooltip: Create a new mean element by drawing a rectangle.Activate a Report Footer, Group Header or Footer subsection.

tool.caption: Count
tool.tooltip: Create a new count element by drawing a rectangle.Activate a Report Footer, Group Header or Footer subsection.

tool.caption: Maximum
tool.tooltip: Create a new maximum element by drawing a rectangle.Activate a Report Footer, Group Header or Footer subsection.

tool.caption: Minimum
tool.tooltip: Create a new minimum element by drawing a rectangle.Activate a Report Footer, Group Header or Footer subsection.

tool.caption: Standard Deviation
tool.tooltip: Create a new standard deviation element by drawing a rectangle.Activate a Report Footer, Group Header or Footer subsection.

tool.caption: Sum
tool.tooltip: Create a new sum element by drawing a rectangle.Activate a Report Footer, Group Header or Footer subsection.

tool.caption: Median
tool.tooltip: Create a new median element by drawing a rectangle.Activate a Report Footer, Group Header or Footer subsection.

tool.caption: Attachments
tool.tooltip: Add attachments to the report. Use the property pane to specify additional properties.Activate the Details subsection. The report data source must contain attachments.

tool.caption: Chart Frame
tool.tooltip: Create new chart frame on the report.

tool.caption: Navigate
tool.tooltip:
1. Pan 2. Zoom 3. Continuous zoom
Quick shortcuts: Shift = zoom rectangle Insert = zoom to full page C = explore when using another tool < = previous extent > = next extent

tool.tooltip: Create a new point on the report.Activate a report subsection.

tool.tooltip: Create a new line on the report.Activate a report subsection.

tool.tooltip: Create a new line on the report by drawing a Bezier curve.Activate a report subsection.

button.caption: New Presentation
button.tooltip: Create a new presentation and add it to the project. The new presentation is saved within the project.

button.caption: New Presentation
button.tooltip: Create a new presentation and add it to the project. The new presentation is saved within the project.

button.caption: Import Presentation
button.tooltip: A presentation stored in an ArcGIS Pro presentation file is added to the project and opened. A copy of the presentation is added to the project. Future changes to the presentation file are not reflected in the project.

button.caption: Open
button.tooltip: View the presentation.

button.caption: Open Properties
button.tooltip: View the properties of the presentation.

button.caption: Open Page Setup
button.tooltip: View the page setup of the presentation.

button.caption: Delete
button.tooltip: Remove the presentations from the project.

button.tooltip: Paste selection from clipboard.

button.caption: Cut
button.tooltip: Cut selection to the clipboard.

button.caption: Copy

button.caption: Delete
button.tooltip: Delete the selected items from the presentation.

button.caption: Duplicate
button.tooltip: Duplicate the selected items.

button.caption: Hide
button.tooltip: Hide the selected pages from appearing in the presentation or exported file.

button.tooltip: Unhide the hidden pages so they are visible in the presentation.

button.tooltip: Zoom to full page extent to refresh the thumbnail.

button.caption: Copy
button.extendedCaption: Copy the highlighted item(s) to the clipboard
button.tooltip: Copy selection to the clipboard.

button.caption: Delete
button.extendedCaption: Delete the selection; on map editing context menu
button.tooltip: Delete the selected items. For items that reference a file or folder on disk, the file or folder is deleted in the file system.

button.caption: Full Screen
button.tooltip: Start presenting in full screen mode.Add at least one page to the presentation and ensure that the selected page is visible. Hidden pages cannot be displayed in full screen.

button.caption: Export Presentation
button.extendedCaption: Export the pages of the presentation to a file on disk
button.tooltip: Export the presentation to a file on disk.The presentation must contain at least one visible page.

button.caption: Custom page size...
button.tooltip: Set a custom page size.

button.caption: Page from Printer
button.tooltip: Copy page size from a printer.

button.caption: None
button.tooltip: The page transitions without an effect.

button.caption: Fade
button.tooltip: Apply fade transition to the page.

button.caption: Swipe From Right
button.tooltip: Apply swipe from right transition to the page.

button.caption: Swipe From Left
button.tooltip: Apply swipe from left transition to the page.

button.caption: Swipe From Top
button.tooltip: Apply swipe from top transition to the page.

button.caption: Swipe From Bottom
button.tooltip: Apply swipe from bottom transition to the page.

button.caption: Rulers
button.tooltip: Show or hide the rulers.

button.caption: Guides
button.tooltip: Show or hide the guides.

button.caption: Add Guide
button.tooltip: Add a snapping guide to your layout at the location you clicked.

button.caption: Add Multiple Guides
button.tooltip: Add multiple snapping guides to your layout.

button.caption: Remove Guide
button.tooltip: Remove the snapping guide under the mouse.

button.caption: Remove All Guides
button.tooltip: Remove all the snapping guides from your layout.

button.caption: Ruler Properties
button.tooltip: Change the ruler settings.

button.caption: Guide Snapping
button.tooltip: Snap to guides when using interactive presentation tools.

button.caption: Element Snapping
button.tooltip: Snap to other elements when using interactive presentation tools.

button.caption: Page Snapping
button.tooltip: Snap to page boundaries when using interactive presentation tools.

tool.caption: Rectangle
tool.tooltip: Select elements by clicking them or dragging a box around them.

tool.caption: Explore
tool.tooltip:
1. View pop-ups and pan 2. Zoom, rotate / tilt (3D-only) 3. Zoom continuous
Quick shortcuts: Shift = zoom rectangle Ctrl = view pop-ups within rectangle N = point north B = look around (in 3D) C = explore when using another tool V = rotate / tilt Ctrl+Alt+C = quick enable

gallery.caption: Map
gallery.tooltip: Insert a new map page to the presentation. A map page requires a map or a scene within the project.

gallery.caption: Blank
gallery.tooltip: Insert a new blank page to the presentation.

gallery.caption: Bookmarks
gallery.tooltip: Zoom to, create, or manage bookmarks for maps within your project.
Insert a new graphic element.

gallery.caption: Size
gallery.tooltip: Choose the size of the presentation.

gallery.caption: Orientation
gallery.tooltip: Choose the orientation of the presentation.

gallery.caption: Picture
gallery.tooltip: Create a new picture by choosing a source.

menu.caption: Presentation Map Node Menu
menu.extendedCaption: Context menu for maps in presentations.

menu.caption: Text Menu
menu.extendedCaption: Perform operations on a text element.

page.caption: Select a template type
page.toolTip: Choose from an Esri template or a custom template.

page.caption: Set the data source
page.toolTip: Set a name and select the data source for your report.

page.caption: Filter the data
page.toolTip: Decide which rows to include and specify the fields in your report.

page.caption: Organize the data
page.toolTip: Add grouping, sorting, and summary statistics to your report.

page.caption: Design the report
page.toolTip: Choose the report template, style, and page setup.

page.caption: Set the data sources
page.toolTip: Select data sources for your report.

page.caption: Filter the data
page.toolTip: Decide which rows to include and specify the fields in your report.

page.caption: Connect dynamic elements
page.toolTip: Specify charts and maps to add to report.

insertCondition.description: A condition in which there are potentially elements in the active pane.
A condition in which there's a container for new elements.

insertCondition.caption: Elements or element parts are selected in the active element container.
Elements or element parts are selected in the active layout or report.
Elements are selected in the active element container.
Elements are selected in the active layout view and FORMAT selection is set to the whole element not a part.
Elements are selected in the active layout view and FORMAT selection is set to the whole element not a part.
Elements are selected in the active layout view and FORMAT selection is set to the whole element not a part.
Elements are selected in the active layout view and FORMAT selection is set to the whole element not a part.
Map surrounds are selected in the active layout view.
Elements are selected in the active layout view and FORMAT selection is set to the whole element not a part.
